attributes.action: To Re-instate Nurse Margret Hayward to the Register Of Nurses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Margret Hayward was struck off the register of Nurses for showing up the appalling neglect of our Elderly in hospital. She should be re-instated immediatley. This is know way to treat a caring health professional.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
